name: Ziling Chinese Encoding Conversion Tool
short_description:
Ziling is a universal PHP Chinese Encoding Conversion Tool with smart browser detection and very easy installation.

Ziling does a transparent GB-BIG5, BIG5-GB conversion on the fly and make your site readable for both encoding system.
